body: What version of NumPy are you using? Can you paste the output of `nosetests -v` called on that file? I was debugging some code potentially accessing out of bounds memory but I thought I got everything (not having any such bugs on my mac...). You rebuilt the C extensions right?
I'm able to reproduce the error so no worries; I'll get it fixed shortly

numpy version 1.6.1

C extensions are rebuild, i even un-installed pandas, removed build dir and installed again. Same issue.

```
(pandas)[1853][n] nosetests -v pandas.tseries.tests.test_resample

test_custom_grouper (pandas.tseries.tests.test_resample.TestResample) ... *** glibc detected *** ~/.virtualenvs/pandas/bin/python: double free or corruption (!prev): 0x000000001c447dc0 ***
```
